title: [Large-Scale] Student-Led Scientific Nursing Simulation Education: Course for Exploring Elderly Patient Health Issues and Strengthening Evidence-Based Nursing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and skills, foundational knowledge of elderly patient characteristics, basic understanding of scientific inquiry methods (observation, hypothesis formulation, variable control), and foundational experimental data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Field practice simulation education using smartphone apps as supplementary tools in limited-technology environments. Learners solve patient care problems by applying the scientific method (hypothesis→experiment→analysis→conclusion) under conditions resembling real medical settings. Emphasizes measurement tools and data interpretation skills during evidence collection/analysis.

learning_goals: Learners will identify three or more major health issues in elderly patients (e.g., chronic diseases, fall risks, cognitive impairments) and explain evidence-based nursing strategies grounded in scientific experimental results.

Learners will apply patient-centered communication skills in a simulation environment with 80% accuracy, systematically record observational data, analyze variables, and predict nursing intervention outcomes.

Learners will perform leadership roles (leader/facilitator) at least once in a 4-person team-based scientific inquiry scenario (e.g., climate change response project) and apply three or more consensus-building techniques (e.g., multi-voting, Delphi method, SWOT analysis) to draft a team report.

Learners will use reflective journaling after nursing simulations to create self-evaluations and improvement plans, analyze experimental results, propose evidence-based nursing approaches, and explain the conclusion-drawing process.

resources: Geriatric Nursing Simulation Kit (sphygmomanometer, blood glucose monitoring model, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
